website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and unique kit from a trusted brand.
pros: Mechanism design prevents sudden temperature changes
cons: Rough-in not included, but the company sells compatible valves

customer_reviews.title: Again...feeling ripped off
customer_reviews.text: As with my review of the faucets, I should have read other reviews more carefully. This is NOT ready to use, the rough ins are not included. A ridiculous price for what it is. My husband has been a contractor for 30 years and has never seen this before. Have had to order more parts to install.
customer_reviews.author: Collette in Canada

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, quality set, adjust the gray knob before you put the handle on
customer_reviews.text: Good set, I've bought 3 sets now. They all work great. One thing I missed on the first install is you can adjust the shower knob to turn it on full blast at the perfect temp every time. Adjust the gray knob before you put the finished handle on. Aside from that little mistake install was easy on all three sets.
customer_reviews.author: jachansen

customer_reviews.title: Good update kit but check your tub spout mounting first
customer_reviews.text: This kit was easy to install and worked fine for updating an older 13 series tub/shower faucet with one exception. The tub spout that was provided in my kit is the type that slides directly onto a copper pipe stub. The old Delta tub spout that I was replacing is the type that screws onto a threaded fitting that was sweated onto the copper stub. If you have that configuration and don't want to make plumbing changes, purchase one of the update kits that does not include a tub spout and then purchase the appropriate spout separately.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These fixtures are solid; very well made. I'm very happy with the purchase. I can't comment on how easy the installation was, as my contractor did everything, but I did need to buy a valve and drain separately (both can also be found on amazon) so keep that in mind when buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Valeen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Delta faucet
customer_reviews.text: Installed the Windemere faucet set (oil rubbed bronze) as part of a kids bathroom refurbishment. Uses the Delta Faucet R10000-UNBX MultiChoice(R) Universal Tub and Shower Valve Body rough in valve which is sold separably. Finish seems sturdy and the shower flow is decent but not overly strong. Note that the handle only goes from the off position (as shown in the product image) to full in the up position. So, you only have 90 degrees of travel from off to max/hot.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Cost me $40 in parts to install
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this model to replace our old one of the same kind so I wouldn’t have to buy fittings or special parts to change from delta to another brand. Our water is bad here and ate a hole in our old tub faucet. The cartridge that is behind the water handle Is not the same. And that cartridge cost an extra $40 I should have gotten the one I wanted which was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dennington

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the Dekt
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to install in a customer's house. They knew they liked this delta style and I liked that I could get it delivered so quickly with it being a prime item. All delta fixtures have a lifetime warranty and this one is no different. The product is made of metal and feels sturdy. So far, almost two years after purchase, the customer has experienced no issues with it and it is working just as it should. If you are looking for plumbing fixtures, I highly suggest you look at delta, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Landlord

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, one star less for Delta changing the spout mount
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is an excellent product. It was very easy for me to install, except for the spout. Apparently Delta had changed their mounting style at some point (the older style uses a thicker diameter mount which was sweated on to the piping). This required me to cut the old mount off with a hacksaw, and sand the pipe down to fit the new style mount. Delta should include some kind of adapter instead. But otherwise, I highly recommend this kit, especially if you have the newer style spout mount already - within an hour you'll have an amazing bathroom transformation!!!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but useless
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this faucet because I trusted the Delta name as well as liking its overall design style. I had this professionally installed in my bathroom remodel. However my first shower was sadly disappointing. The low flow shower head was sooooo low I could barely rinse the shampoo out of my long hair. I verified that it is a design issue by switching shower heads and trying it in my other bathroom that I know has amazing pressure. Same thing very dull pressure. I ended up needing to purchase another shower head making this purchase much more then I had wanted to spend in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had our fixtures installed 2 weeks ago and they look great. However, the cartridge on one of the units is leaking and I sent an email to Delta asking for a replacement (per their warranty in the installation booklet). It has been nearly a week and I have heard nothing. When I called their number, the hold message said that they are experiencing longer than normal hold times and to reach out via email...which has been done, but no response. In the meantime, I am leaking water for over a week. I will be going to buy a new cartridge today as I am tired of money, literally, going down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Kammerer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Can't comment on durability, as we've only had it a couple weeks. Easy install, used with a Delta rough in valve. Looks good and works, though water pressure is quite low. but that could also be our pipes. Not a true oil rubbed bronze, more dark brown with a copper accent line...its fine for us. Goes with the rest of our hardware. Water marks wipe off easily so far. Wish the shower head could swivel a bit more, and it's also a pretty short neck. All in all, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy dean

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; broken tub spout
customer_reviews.text: I had my plumber install the tub spout. When he took it out of the box he noticed that the plastic piece inside the spout was cracked. So my plumber had to run out and get a part to fix the issue causing my bill to go up of course. I am so disappointed in delta’s quality. I spent more to get what I thought was a higher quality product only to spend more money in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with the item
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with the item! We bought early for house and once the contractors got it installed it was past the delivery period and it doesn't work. The hot/cold water valve leaks. We have read through all of the installation manual and contractor trouble shooted everything. Still pours out a prominent stream of water when the faucet is turned off. No way to contact anyone since the return date was passed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Cathey

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the unit is the handheld spray and the different stream. What I don’t like about the unit is the outer rim of the shower head does operate as I would like it to, but I’m okay with it. A licensed plumber installed the unit. It does not come with a valve, I purchased a Delta valve separately from a local plumbing store. The color is what I was looking for, to match my decor. I had the plumber adjust the temperature to the hottest setting, since it comes from the manufacture with a set temperature.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and easy install
customer_reviews.text: easy install. looks and works great. love delta. one drawback is how the spigot connects. you need to solder a 1/2" copper pipe and leave like an inch stick out of wall. If youe ever switch spigots in the future your in trouble because you have to get the same kind. i like either of the other filler setups delta offers with their other models.
customer_reviews.author: Ty K

customer_reviews.title: No water pressure ...  horrible
customer_reviews.text: Style is exactly what I was looking for but don’t buy. Every time I take a shower all I feel is sprinkling water it’s driving me crazy. At first I thought it was installed incorrectly but I had another person review it and it has nothing to do with the way it was installed WANT MY MONEY BACK
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Functions Nicely
customer_reviews.text: As with some others who have reviewed this, I found it to initially not allow the water to get very hot. Thanks to a thorough and super helpful response to a question about that above, I was able to adjust mine and now get sufficiently hot (beyond sufficient, really) water for my showers. If reviews mentioning water not getting hot enough conern you, that's definitely reasonable; but if you have the skills to install this guy (or are hiring someone with said skills), adjusting it should be no problem, so don't let that deter you.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: not a universal replacement.
customer_reviews.text: most delta kits are universal replacements for existing Delta faucet combinations. Unfortunately the most expensive part i.e. the valve was not compatible with existing one. had to spend an extra $50/ - get the correct valve... buy hardware from store.. I would not recommend buying from amazon. also PSA .. for plumbing parts like this returns is not free...very very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: R. Ghanta

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you understand what’s contained in the package
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied with the quality of the faucet. I had to return the item because it did not come with some piece required to complete the installation. That’s no fault of the seller as it was disclosed. I just didn’t understand the disclosure (the piece that was required). Besides that, I would have kept the item. I would recommend confirming if you will need that piece (which from my contractors explanation, everyone would need it)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...nice and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and seems sturdy. Keep in mind the shower head has one of those water saver things built into it. If you want a more powerful spray (it’s pretty weak as it is) you’ll need to figure out how to remove the restrictor. But it does look lovely in our new bathroom. I had to purchase another part that you’ll need to connect to the water supply. I believe the specific part is mentioned in the above description.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. Anthis

customer_reviews.title: Water spots
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this faucet and shower head but I will say I wish I had purchased Moen brand. The stainless gets water spots all over and has to be wiped down constantly. I've never had a problem with our Moen fixtures that seem much more spot resistant.
customer_reviews.author: tmckim

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! I'm not sure how "stainless steel" can peel, but the finish is peeling off the head. I purchased this in December...not happy.
customer_reviews.author: hockeymom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Valve
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my daughter's bathroom remodel and when I saw it installed and operational, I loved it so much I bought two more for my bathroom remodel. The unit is very heavy duty and well constructed. The valve operates very smoothly and is easily adjustable for the temperature of the water. Nice sealing from the valve to the wall and solid movement inside. The finish is consistent with the price and quality you would expect at this price point. Very pleased. I purchased several additional pieces among this product line and they are all consistently finished.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but low pressure
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Standard install. However, the pressure is definitely not “high performance”. I’ll have to replace the shower head due to the low pressure. There’s nothing wrong with the install or piping. Delta, is there not a water restrictor I can remove?
customer_reviews.author: Kerrigan clark

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy handle, hard to install for perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Finding the correct faucet for our bathroom remodel turned out to be the largest challenge of the job. This was probably our second faucet handle and it took four tries and a plumber's expertise to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The shower stopped working after a few months. When I pull the tab up that redirects the bath water up to the shower head, it redirects some of the water but the shower water pressure is horrible. I'll be buying another brand for all future faucet purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk sad to see delta has became just another Chinese disposable product. Shower heads leak no matter what I do on install
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zurkuhlen

customer_reviews.title: "kit"
customer_reviews.text: sold as a KIT. it's fine. "PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION" of this UNIT which is how it's sold is $70.12. selling installation is wrong. the "PROFESSIONAL" came out and said he would only change out the shower head. for $400. this makes me sick to my stomach. unethical and should be reported to licensing Board.
customer_reviews.author: Red 4rd

customer_reviews.title: this is the same product you pay alot more for at Home Depot and it's the same quaility
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong Item number and have to send it back but this is the same product Home depot has and its 50 dollars more there. Had I not had to have it that day I would have exchanged it and saved money, I ordered the wrong style number. This again, is the same Delta product . Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: P. B

customer_reviews.title: Delta Windemere is a great choice for upscale bath remodel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower trim along with roman tub trim, 8" wide spaced faucets, and matching towel bars, toilet paper holder from the same family. We're doing a full remodel of master bath and I have confidence in the delta brand for quality and fair prices. Although this product is due for installation in a couple of weeks, I have no doubt that we'll be very pleased. highly recommend Delta and the Windemere line.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our recently remodeled guest bathroom. As always Amazon offered a much better price than my local home improvement store. The faucet was easy to install and looks beautiful in my new shower. I was worried about the water pressure provided through this shower head but I must admit that’s it’s really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Vorys

customer_reviews.title: Different than photos
customer_reviews.text: In the photos, the piece behind the handle is supposed to be oil rubbed bronze, but instead, it is matte black. I contacted CS and they sent me a new one, and I specifically told CS to mention that the piece is all black but they ended up sending me the same exact set with the matte black. Doesn't look terrible, but just looks weird that it is not oil rubbed bronze as advertised and doesn't match the other components.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Le

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this, we were renevating our bathroom and so it sat in the box until it was time to be installed. At this time, we realized that it did not have the needed valve, which is available seperately, however most at Lowes or Home Depot are included. By the time we went to install this faucet, we learned that it would not work with our water pressure either and are now stuck with a faucet because too much time had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tub spout
customer_reviews.text: The showers head is great but the tub faucet is the worst. We replaced it within a couple of weeks of using the old one. It had a lot of movement on the pipe and the stopper couldn’t tolerate the water flow so it would leak while the shower was on
customer_reviews.author: arris

customer_reviews.title: Great to look at but NO Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Great to look at but NO Pressure!!!! I even had a professional plumber install it. I will never buy the shower kit again. It dribbles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs Adapter or special rough-in
customer_reviews.text: It's noted on ONE of the pictures in the bottom corner that these fixtures need a special rough-in valve or possibly an adapter to work. I would think that this needs to be communicated a bit louder! Had issues installing, needed to special order the adapter piece...hoping it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Carsten

customer_reviews.title: This is not a full set only trim kit be aware
customer_reviews.text: This product is only the trim kit and cartridge there is no valve assembly it is not a hole Fossett please be aware!!!! They should not sell it as a full Fossett kit if it’s not or they should notify on the page it’s just wasted five hours of my time to go find a damn valve that matches this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I am liking this, we can't seem to get enough water flow from the fixture to take a reasonable shower - working with plumber, he thought the fixture was a quality fixture and things the water flow issue may be the in-wall valve. Make sure to check the shower head filter - it can clog with deposits quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Peschong

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: As with any bathroom installation, this was tricky for us since we had to cut the whole in our new bathroom surround. Loved the changing from two handles to one. If you plan to do that, you need another part but it works well. Looks beautiful and matches the rest of our room.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Six

customer_reviews.title: Delta has to many sizes nothing matches up
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy new valve, new faucet pipe connector, spent another $80 to get to work with existing pipes
customer_reviews.author: shane ott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The size is small. Handle is small. Bath faucet is small (should have reviewed dimensions more thoroughly). Overall, I wound up buying a new bath faucet and this one is still in the box. Wish i would have continued shopping before purchasing this ine.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, water pressure is unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shower trim, works perfect for what we wanted (dual shower heads in the master bath). However, the water pressure is somewhat lacking - removed the water regulator and got slightly better results, but still, it's more like a rain-shower head (good flow directly in the water path) but doesn't spray or have great coverage. If you stand underneath the shower head, it's a drenching "waterfall", but there is no wide cone spread with high-pressure like my former Delta shower head. Overall, nice looking product, good price on Amazon, hubby loves it, I like it, but I can also see how others may be disappointed with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: AfternoonDelights

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This arrived without the shower neck (stem? I don't know what you call the piece that connects the shower head to the wall) or the screws for the plate... Amazon warehouse really needs to check what they're sending out for accuracy and completeness. I expect the product to be as described, maybe damaged, etc. But I expect it to be all there and so far Amazon warehouse has sent me multiple items that were either not the item at all or missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A. McKenney

customer_reviews.title: Solid value for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this product. The pressure on the shower head is the same as the elaborate one we replaced. It looks attractive and was relatively easy to install. I consider it a good value at $100, probably comparable to something sold separately that would cost twice as much. Definitely advise you get the valve that goes with it as unless you have installed a second tier Delta product recently you are going to need to open up the wall and put in the new valve.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delta is good as usual.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some older stuff with this new delta kit. Worked out great. I put the shower head on one of those gooseneck riser pipes to get it up higher than the pipe that comes with the kit. Works excellent. I always trust Delta quality..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I arrived to me broken and its to laye for a return
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: No pressure
customer_reviews.text: Arrived beautifully! Looks amazing on my shower. Make sure you pay attention because it doesn’t come with the $40 valve. I didn’t but no biggie, my local Lowe’s had one. Now the reason I gave this shower head 3 stars is because the pressure. The pressure out of the head is not very hard. It’s very disappointing because now I have to buy a new shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Chastine Owens

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is new/old stock and does NOT match the picture shown or description given. Shower head is NOT the new style with the rubber face and no "Touch Clean Spray Holes" like the description. Value trim ring, handle, and shower head arm are all as pictured and does include a valve insert. This is a good, new condition product and is a GREAT value, but description is not 100%.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: The Quality you expect from Delta
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this shower handle and head. It complements the tile in my new shower well. It was fairly easy to install, although I had to enlist my wife to help me get the handle on. The instructions are easy to follow, and it fit right in the place of my other Delta fixture. I was unaware, however, that you can only replace Delta fixtures with Delta, as I ordered a different brand of fixture that was not even close to the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the shower head nozzles is not self cleaning type.
customer_reviews.text: The shower head is great looking, but the nozzle is not self cleaning (not separate rubber nozzles). Something to be aware of since it might not be obvious (or at least it is not to me when I bought it). The rest are good.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice. The price is unbeatable here on Amazon. Quality is nice but below what you think it would be. Still a fantastic deal and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: The faucet stripped easily. Had to buy another (different brand from Home Depot - also slightly off in color). Otherwise, looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Golder

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome well-made product, however when water has been turned off there is a drip that lingers for a few second before completely shutting off. This is important for those that are water conservation conscience. Otherwise, the bronze finish is good quality no water staining.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in our new snail shower stall. The color was perfect. The water stream is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Paydock

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Low star because it does not work with American standard fixtures. Beautiful product. But should say you will have to change out all pipes in wall to get to work
customer_reviews.author: Kym Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our new bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! The only thing that I didn’t consider when I purchased this shower head is that you can’t adjust the spray. It works great and is a nice addition to our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JC Fan

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't care about the flow of your water or your looking for a lower gpm then this will be fine, but the details on the shower says it is a 2.00gpm and it is not. It is only at max a 1.75gpm! Not what we ordered, not what we want.
customer_reviews.author: Janetta Strieder

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!!️
customer_reviews.text: I just remodeled my bathroom and I wanted to change the chrome to the oil bronze and this set was very nice worked great👍🏻🙂
customer_reviews.author: Nooksie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wish they would include an extended sleeve to fit over the older valves. I had to buy one in addition to this for about $40 more for a little piece of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Ok at best
customer_reviews.text: First the good: it looks ok once installed and it’s failry low priced The bad: the valve is basically junk. I tossed it in the trash and used one I bought elsewhere. Installing the valve isn’t as straightforward as it should be
customer_reviews.author: nutsmunkey2000

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a house I was flipping. Very nice finish and looks super classy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rains

customer_reviews.title: shower head
customer_reviews.text: We love the style of the shower head and handle. The Bronze color is exactly what we wanted. Very good Quality... excellent Price!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. Easy to clean and the water flow is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I couldn't keep it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but I just had to return it due to my setup. Would of worked nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lupo

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: this is a value product, feels a little cheap in the hand
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Frank Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Check before buy
customer_reviews.text: A pro plumber tried to install but could get the unit to tighten enough to prevent leaks. Should have checked to see how unit attached to plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Havey

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: The shower head is.not very powerful, comes out like light rain.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Classy look
customer_reviews.text: Put 4 of these in a house we’re flipping. The delta multi choice makes it nice to rough in the valve, then order the trim kit later on in the job, so it doesn’t get lost or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fast update if you already have the rough-in
customer_reviews.text: A nice easy update if you've already got the Monitor style rough-in. The components are a bit flimsy for the price, lots of plastic in what used to be metal. But you have to spend a lot to get really quality stuff I suppose. But we wanted to update our bath and not spend a ton, since what was there wasn't that old and still worked.
customer_reviews.author: A. Luptak

customer_reviews.title: Wish we would have bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and has been good with our hard, well water.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Short return window for construction supply product
customer_reviews.text: Product was not complete as it did not include the mixer valve that goes into the framing of the tub/shower. We just opened the box to have contractor install and discovered this. Unfortunately, we are unable to return as the time expired for returning this new in the box product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Looks like bronze.
customer_reviews.text: Think plastic. Shower head is smaller than the picture and head nozzles are not touch cleaning. A version for people that are into the bronze look rather than quality.
customer_reviews.author: Groom Lake

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality set of bathroom hardware
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to replace our old Delta crystal-knobbed bathroom hardware, and this kit was perfect. It included the showerhead with elbow and collar, valve assembly, Delta Monitor, and tub spout. Install was a breeze- it literally only took about 20 minutes to swap everything out. I would recommend adding a coat of wax though to limit water spots if you have hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE/ will end up costing you more
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is beautiful BUT any cost saving goes away when you have to buy an additional part. The inner workings are just enough off that they do not adapt to a regular plumbing set up. the part/ cartridge you need to fix the problem is $50
customer_reviews.author: Laurie R.

customer_reviews.title: got 2 for a remodel and they work fine
customer_reviews.text: Its been 3 months and the only downside i would say is the screw on the handle area is rusting already. other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It would have been easy to install but we had a older shower kit so we had to call a Plummer in and redo our pipes for this one to fit
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harry

customer_reviews.title: Simplistic Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Great proctors and price purchased 5. Happy with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry kemp

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in one box. Easy to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking/working
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, had trouble with the tub faucet leaking when shower was on, they sent replacement interior part, but turned out to to be my error. I also bought the wall valve and installed it myself. I have done 3-4 in the past, you may want to call a plumber if this is your first
customer_reviews.author: Spot not Sport

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality and fits almost all Delta fixtures. This ships with a valve but does not ship with the plumbing housing that is typically called a "rough in fixture."
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love the shower head
customer_reviews.text: I love the shower head on this faucet. It goes with my sink faucets and whirlpool and is so nice looking in the shower. It’s Delta, do you know it’s a good faucet
customer_reviews.author: rnforeveryoung

customer_reviews.title: Good except for tub Faucet did not fit My previous fittings on the tub
customer_reviews.text: It looks very pretty and the shower head and the handle or easy to get in place however I had to keep using my 19-year-old faucet for the tub because the fittings would not fix and they could not be replaced easily
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Day

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete pieces
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to install and it was incomplete. I had to buy the rest of the pieces and end up spending more than the price if this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really like the way this looks in my bathroom for the kids, and its easy for them to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. My plumber said it would work with my existing plumbing. Sadly I sent it back. It is the nicest looking unit in my search of replacements. Way less money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharen F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: This faucet for the shower & diverter trim package made the recent bathroom renovation come together just perfect. Nice finish, clean lines & the shower head is nice size to give a good spray
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was the best deal I found for this & it is beautiful. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Link

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: This came with all the correct parts. My builder is astonished by the great price. Love the finish on this product, and it looks awesome in my tub. My house is still under construction, so I can't test it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Lady

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, functions well, but a larger shower head would be better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Amour

customer_reviews.title: Quality shower head
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head!! I am glad we spent a little more for a quality shower head.
customer_reviews.author: RachMcc

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice showerhead for a great price, not sure why people are complaining that the pressure isnt good, it feels fine to me. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: price was slightly better than lowes and with the free shipping I chose to order from amazon. looks great in new shower
customer_reviews.author: kim hobson

customer_reviews.title: Scarred on wall base. Very noticeable
customer_reviews.text: The wall mount was scarred. Too late to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Darlene Walker

customer_reviews.title: Quality product does well with low volume
customer_reviews.text: Used in two new showers in an addition. The are way hight quality than normal box store versions no plastic parts. used with 1/2 in pex supply lines and the shower head design does a good jib even with a smaller volume of water that is a side effect of the pex.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Attractive; Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set for the price--very attractive. My handyman said they were extremely easy to install. I replaced the shower head with a matching hand-held.
customer_reviews.author: Beckett ShionaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not metal
customer_reviews.text: If you want metal faucet this is not for you. Product is plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: cartridge make sure you check
customer_reviews.text: great product but cartridge was a waste would not fit and had to go to home depot and spend an additional $40.oo for one to fit.So I lost $$ on this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Just out of the package looking like this.... super bummed. For the price you pay for this, should have been inspected and better quality
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Puskarich

customer_reviews.title: Not enough water pressure with new faucet
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the look, but now there is hardly any water pressure. I would take my old silver delta faucet any day over this beautiful new one. Tub and shower don't have near the water pressure as our old one. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift for my daughter. Her husband was remodeling their master bath. They are beautiful. They have kept their color and the efficency for as much as they are used. A great buy
customer_reviews.author: The Victorian Hat

product_meta.title: Delta Faucet Windemere Single-Function Tub and Shower Trim Kit with Single-Spray Shower Head, Oil Rubbed Bronze BT14496-OB (Valve Not Included)
product_meta.description:
Style:Tub/Shower Faucet| Color:Oil-Rubbed Bronze| Size:Without RoughRustic Oil Rubbed Bronze brings old-warm charm to your bathroom for an inviting, sophisticated look in a stunning combination of deep, warm tones and hand-relieved bronze highlights for a truly unique look. Delta pressure-balance shower valves use monitor technology to protect you and your family from sudden water temperature changes due to flushing toilets or running appliances. Delta WaterSense labeled sink faucets, shower faucets and toilets use at least 20% less water than the industry standard—saving you money without compromising performance. This unit does not include the required Delta MultiChoice Universal Valve and must be purchased separately (recommended rough-in model R10000-UNBX). You can install with confidence, knowing that Delta shower faucets are backed by our lifetime limited warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Delta brand is focused on being more than a maker of great products: we're using water to transform the way people feel every day. Our products are beautifully engineered inside and out with consumer-inspired innovations like Touch2O Technology, which lets you turn your faucet on and off with just a touch, to In2ition Two-in-One Showers that get water where you need it most using an integrated shower head and hand shower. We’re committed to making technology for faucets, showers, toilets and more feel like magic that makes your busy life a little easier, because we believe there’s a better way to experience water.
feature_bullets: Rough sold separately: Tub faucet and shower trim kit only, purchase Delta's MultiChoice universal shower valve separately to complete the unit (recommended rough-in valve model R10000-UNBX)
Lifetime limited warranty: You can install with confidence, knowing this Delta shower head and shower trim kit are backed by Delta Faucet’s lifetime limited warranty
Intensely powerful: Immerse yourself in the steady, intensely powerful full body spray with forceful streams of water to satisfy all of your showering needs

Protection from sudden temperature changes: The monitor pressure-balanced valve cartridge (included) ensures a consistent shower temperature by balancing the pressure of both hot and cold water, so no sudden temperature changes from toilet flushing or running appliances
WaterSense labeled: WaterSense labeled so you can enjoy a warm, drenching shower experience while using 20% less water—saving you money without compromising performance

specifications.Included Components: Shower head, Tub spout, Trim kit, Handle
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,124 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
